hero.description: At Kiwitech Solutions, we transform your business ideas into high-quality, reliable, and scalable systems - from websites to complex network solutions.

homeServices.title: Our Core Services
homeServices.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of services that meet every requirement of your business.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Modern, responsive websites that adapt to any device, built with Next.js and Tailwind.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Fast and efficient mobile apps for iOS and Android based on React Native.

cctv.title: Video Surveillance
cctv.description: Real-time security for your facility using IP cameras and intelligent analytics.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Kiwitech Solutions
whyUs.subtitle: What sets our services apart? Why do over 50 successful companies trust us?

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: We don't just write code, we create stable and reliable solutions that meet international standards.

process.title: Optimized Process
process.description: Thanks to clear work stages, we deliver projects on time and within budget.

security.title: First-Class Security
security.description: Protecting your data and users is our priority. We ensure cybersecurity in every solution.

support.title: Reliable Partnership
support.description: Project delivery is just the beginning. We provide ongoing technical support and consulting as your business grows.

workProcess.title: How is the Project Implemented?
workProcess.subtitle: Our proven 4-stage approach clearly shows the path from idea to reality.

step1.title: Analysis & Strategy
step1.description: We study your business, analyze goals, and develop a clear strategy for success.

step2.title: UI/UX Design & Prototype
step2.description: We create user-friendly and modern designs and coordinate interactive prototypes with you.

step3.title: Development & Testing
step3.description: We turn design into clean and efficient code and test the system for flawless operation.

step4.title: Launch & Support
step4.description: We deploy your project to the server and provide technical support to ensure stable operation.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: We want to hear your idea and discuss how we can help bring it to reality.

footer.description: Your reliable technology partner, turning ideas into digital reality.

services.seoDescription: We offer websites, mobile apps, network services, video surveillance, and IT consulting solutions for your business.
services.pageDescription: Technology solutions tailored to your business needs, results-oriented, and scalable.

webDev.title: Custom Websites
webDev.description: We create fast websites for your business that attract customers and look beautiful on any device (phone, computer).

mobileApps.title: Mobile Applications
mobileApps.description: We develop convenient and efficient mobile applications that live on your customers' phones and work on both iPhone and Android.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: We ensure that your site or app is not only beautiful, but also understandable and very easy to use. Customers won't get lost.

devops.title: Server Services (DevOps)
devops.description: We ensure your site or app runs continuously. Updates are released quickly and error-free, and the system is ready for heavy loads.

videoSurveillance.title: Video Surveillance Systems
videoSurveillance.description: We install cameras that show all areas for the security of your office, warehouse, or home. You can monitor them from your phone too.

networking.title: Computer Networks
networking.description: We create a unified system where all your computers and devices quickly and securely "communicate" with each other. Your office will have no Wi-Fi "dead zones".

biometrics.title: Access Control (Biometrics)
biometrics.description: Systems that open doors using face recognition or fingerprints. You'll know exactly when your employees come and go, and unauthorized access is blocked.

consulting.title: IT Consulting
consulting.description: Don't know which technology to spend money on? We help determine which software will bring more benefits to your business.

services.ctaDescription: We want to hear your idea and discuss how we can help bring it to reality.

about.seoDescription: Learn about the Kiwitech Solutions team, our mission, and values.
about.pageSubtitle: We create innovative solutions for your business using technology.
about.missionText: Our main mission is to contribute to our clients' success through digitizing their business. We take an individual approach to each project and offer the most effective technology solutions.
about.teamText: The Kiwitech Solutions team consists of experienced programmers, designers, and IT specialists who are masters of their craft. We constantly learn and develop, which is why we apply the latest technologies in our projects.

contact.seoDescription: Contact Kiwitech Solutions. We are ready to implement your projects.
contact.pageSubtitle: Have an idea or just a question? We're always ready to help.
contact.successMessage: Thank you! We have received your message. Our team will contact you as soon as possible.
contact.error: An error occurred. Please try again or contact us directly.
